name: Summer Vacation Getaway
description: Win an all-inclusive trip for two to a tropical paradise! Enjoy sun, sand, and sea in this once-in-a-lifetime vacation.

name: Tech Gadget Bundle
description: Get your hands on the latest tech! This bundle includes a new smartphone, a smartwatch, and wireless earbuds.

name: Gourmet Dining Experience
description: A dinner for four at a Michelin-starred restaurant. Indulge in an exquisite tasting menu prepared by a world-renowned chef.
